name: Stairwell (Justin Klein)
description:
Description:

You have just been hired as an intern for the Onset Corporation. Congratulations! The Onset corporation is known for collecting and documenting various artifacts around the world that are known to have special properties. Your boss has assigned you to retrieve what seems to be a simple VHS recorder from an abandoned house. However, other co-workers who have attempted to retrieve the VHS recorder have reported experiencing symptoms of nausea, hallucinations, headaches, heart attacks, and death. Do you have what it takes to get the VHS recorder and get out alive?

Controls:

WASD - Move around

Esc - Quit

P - Pause

Space - jump

Left Click - interact

F - Flashlight

Credits:

Programming - Justin Klein

Debugging - Jackson Clayton, Maxim Mamotilivi

Level Design - Justin Klein

Audio - Maxim Mamotilivi

Textures - Justin Klein

Ideas - Maxim Mamotilivi
